edu.doane.dugal.samples.bugbomb

Class BugBomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.doane.dugal.samples.bugbomb.BugBomb
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Problem

    public class BugBomb
extends java.lang.Object
implements Problem
    This class represents the bug bomb problem based on New Light Industry's Generator GA software demo spreadsheet. There are 12 wasp nests in an attic, and we have three bug bombs to kill 'em; the GA chooses where to place the bombs for maximum carnage! Each bomb has a radius of 15; every wasp within that radius is killed.
    Version:
    03/06/2004
    Author:
    Mark M. Meysenburg
